I strongly condemn the low terrorist attack against Russia's Ambassador to Ankara Mr. Andrey Karlov.
I convey the sadness and condolences to the friendly Russian people and Mr. Karlov's family in the person of Mr. President Putin of Russia.
We see this attack as being made to Turkey, the Turkish State and the Turkish Nation in the presence of the Russian Federation Ambassador in our country.
Karlov's assassination is a clear provocation for Turkish-Russian relations.
We will not give any opportunity to break or break Turkey-Russia relations.
